title: Firefox not saving Bankwest PAN number when asked to
content: When I go to Bankwest online banking, I first put in an 8 digit PAN number and tick the box to SAVE this. Then I subsequently put in my password and the connection is correctly made. Next time I log in, the PAN number is never there. This is very inconvenient as obviously I have so many passwords, etc. to remember. when I used to use Safari, there was no problem. You do put a warning not to save this if the computer is available to multiple users but mine is not. Can you please help me?
creator: davivac

title: Unable to log into my hotmail account all of a sudden
content:
Hello, I am able to log into my hotmail account no problem with all browsers and have always been able to with Firefox but tonight it stops me and gives me a security warning risk. I cannot go to the site out of the blue after years of no issues. How can I resolve this issue? Anyone know whats going on?

Thank you.
